name: Chocolate Coconut Zucchini Bread
description: Chocolate Coconut Zucchini Bread is quick, delicious, and the perfect use for garden zucchini. Enjoy a slice with your morning coffee, or serve it up for dessert.
keywords: Bread, Chocolate, Coconut, Summer Recipes, Zucchini
recipeIngredient: 1 cup CRISCO® Organic Refined Coconut Oil, melted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Spray two 8x4-inch loaf pans with PillsburyÂ® BakingÂ Spray with Flour.
In a medium bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, salt, baking soda, baking powderÂ and cinnamon.
In a large bowl with an electric mixer, mix the coconut oil and sugars untilÂ combined. Mix in the sour cream. Add in the eggs and vanilla and mix untilÂ thoroughly incorporated.
Slowly add dry ingredients to wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
Â Add in the zucchini and mix for about 1 minute, or until the batter is moistenedÂ and the zucchini is evenly incorporated into the batter. Stir in the chocolate chipsÂ and shredded coconut.
Spread the batter into the prepared pans and bake in preheatedÂ oven for 55-60Â minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Cool bread in pan for 1/2 hour. Remove bread to a wire rack to cool completely.
